additional_media_info.title: IMF Official on Upcoming China-U.S. Summit
additional_media_info.description: Biden-Xi meeting is topping headlines. While IMF readjusted China's growth rate to a 5.4%, its First Deputy Managing Director is keen on protecting trade achievements over the past decades.

additional_media_info.description: Biden-Xi meeting is topping headlines. While IMF readjusted China's growth rate to a 5.4%, its First Deputy Managing Director is keen on protecting trade achievements over the past decades.

legacy.full_text: Upon Xi-Biden meeting in San Francisco #APEC2023 , @IMF 's First Deputy Managing Director @GitaGopinath has one important hope for the two: do not destroy the fruits of the decades of close trade cooperation. Point on! https://t.co/DQiedX5J3N

legacy.full_text: RT @AmbXieFeng: Vice Premier He Lifeng, Chinese lead person for China-US economic and trade affairs, held candid, pragmatic, in-depth and c…

legacy.description: 12th Chinese Ambassador to the United States
legacy.name: Xie Feng 谢锋

result.text: Vice Premier He Lifeng, Chinese lead person for China-US economic and trade affairs, held candid, pragmatic, in-depth and constructive talks with @SecYellen in the US. Both sides are committed to implementing the important common understanding between the two Presidents, preparing economic outcomes for the upcoming summit in San Francisco, and bringing China-US economic and trade relations back to the track of sound and stable development. They exchanged views on China-US economic relations, macro economy in both countries and the world, combating global challenges and addressing each other's concerns.

legacy.full_text: Whether it's sunny/rainy days, there're always those devoting themselves to this significant cause! A pleasure talking to @TimShriver @SpecialOlympics when he was in China. I witnessed first hand the beautiful comraderie, love and Special Olympics athletes have for each other. https://t.co/Az3bovwIeD

She talks about their 'sweet' exports: honey,  ice cream... AND efforts needed for growth in the long run https://t.co/PoVb368Oy7

They have been preparing for this moment for 10 months! The afterparty features American beer and popcorn. https://t.co/2fri6EbPtn

legacy.full_text: Their favorite dinner menu features Chinese hotpot & liquor. They tell me they cheer for the cooperation between the two countries in sunny days, and would not lose hope even during rainy days. And share these views with other members of  U.S. agricultural delegation in China.

legacy.full_text: U can always look forward to sth. in life! For Robert Aspell, @Cargill Asia Pacific President,  it's enjoying his STEAK @ world's largest expo, knowing so much's AT STAKE in U.S.-China ties. He says the least thing global food security needs is a fragmented world...Agree! https://t.co/lhaLwBe1Tw

He told me the atmosphere of discussions is warm and great.  One can hear not only great conversations but also laughters in the meeting rooms.  #CIIE2023 https://t.co/MjjnHzM1QX

additional_media_info.title: Before APEC Leaders Meet, What is China busy with and why it matters?
additional_media_info.description: Before APEC Economic Leaders Meet, China's busy being the host of #CIIE , the world's largest import expo. I talk with Secretary General Grynspan of UNCTAD on what CIIE can do for developing economies

user_mentions.name: UNCTAD, the UN trade & development body

additional_media_info.title: Before APEC Leaders Meet, What is China busy with and why it matters?
additional_media_info.description: Before APEC Economic Leaders Meet, China's busy being the host of #CIIE , the world's largest import expo. I talk with Secretary General Grynspan of UNCTAD on what CIIE can do for developing economies

legacy.full_text: Before APEC Economic Leaders Meet, China's busy being the host of #CIIE , the world's largest import expo. I talk to Secretary General @RGrynspan of @UNCTAD on what CIIE can do for developing economies. She believes the world's amid "Poly-Globalisation". China  has a crucial role https://t.co/jpRw3pYZLF

legacy.description: Based in Beijing, Fmr. Washington Correspondent, now Anchor of TV show WorldInsight, Young Global Leader @wef , China National Mental Health Ambassador
legacy.name: TIAN Wei

legacy.description: Based in Beijing, Fmr. Washington Correspondent, now Anchor of TV show WorldInsight, Young Global Leader @wef , China National Mental Health Ambassador
legacy.name: TIAN Wei

user_mentions.name: UNCTAD, the UN trade & development body

legacy.full_text: What a reunion! A great interview w. SG @RGrynspan on topics of development & developing countries. She told me that her organisation @UNCTAD has been working on both fronts of dealing w. immediate global emergencies & crises, & continuing actions for long-term development agenda https://t.co/Lp1lRyCcSM

The discussion about "poly-globalization" is an unique part of the interview…It's more decentralized, a network of regional poles, continental economies in the South, and rise of various plurinational forums in the world

legacy.full_text: Photos w. family members of "Flying Tigers" 🐯 who are in Beijing today, visiting exhibition about legacy of their father's & grandfathers' as they flied fighter jets during WWII in the Pacific Rim, helping Chinese people against  intense Japanese bombings. History is cherished🌹 https://t.co/ouDnJfE7g3
